title: Incognito: The More Things Change
description: To protect his brother, Jack Clifton paid the ultimate price. He lost his family and his freedom in one night. All that matters now is finding his daughter. He’s forced to wage a one-man war against a criminal empire leaving no goon unpummeled. The More Things Change is the first installment in the Alex Radash & Paul Sunn’s gritty, noir, down to earth, superhero serial. Unlock Incognito to start Jack’s adventure today.
author: Paul Sunn
